amendment.description: Amendment removes the prohibition of funding to community colleges who received funds for construction, modernization, renovation, and repair under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, or under the higher education act of 1965.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 111-256 to remove the prohibition of funding to community colleges who received funds for construction, modernization, renovation, and repair under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009, or under the higher education act of 1965.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pingree (ME) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Ms. Pingree (ME).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pingree (ME) amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
